  • {@systemProperty http.auth.digest.reEnabledAlgs} (default: <none>)
    + By default, certain message digest algorithms are disabled for use in HTTP Digest + authentication due to their proven security limitations. If it is still + required to use one of these algorithms, then they can be re-enabled by setting + this property to a comma separated list of the algorithm names.
